"A.D.2028/4/15/12:30": "La-Laplace!?"
"An attack beyond the principle of causality... What?! There’s definitely something wrong! That’s 100% impossible! What's wrong with you?!"
"All it means is that your time of reckoning is at hand!"
"Damn!"
"She disappeared?! Where did she go?!"
"That’s what happens when you underestimate your opponent. Och, you can't call youself a scholar if you can't adapt to unforseen circumstances."
"S-Shut up! No one told you to save me!"
"Of course not. I'm aware of that. I didn't come here to save you. The time has come."
"The time... has come?"
"<%me>! Enga! This is an emergency! Hitsugi is... Hitsugi is...!"
"Stop it, Kohri! You're being tricked!"
"Fufu, what are you talking about, Hitsugi? I haven't been tricked at all."
"This weapon, this strength... this was all attained because I desired it. Mother has nothing to do with this."
"I'm here of my own free will. Because I wanted to save Hitsugi, I came here."
"Your own free will...?"
"Hitsugi, say, Hitsugi? Why is Hitsugi on that side? Why are you in a different place than me?"
"What exactly does Hitsugi hope to accomplish with them?"
"See, you can't answer! Hitsugi is being controlled after all! Hitsugi is the one being tricked..."
"N-No! That's not true! I decided it for myself... Why I'm here, why I fight, what I use my strength for!"
"Then why are you so lost?"
"I've said this before, haven't I? Hitsugi is someone who keeps moving forward, without hesitation. I don't want to see this lost Hitsugi."
"If you're not being tricked or controlled, and you're not lost... then strike me down."
"Strike you... down?"
"What's wrong? Move forward, without hesitation. If you're telling the truth, then I'll be okay being slain by you. Now do it."
"As I expected... You're not Hitsugi, after all."
"I will strike you down. Without hesitation. After all, that's the only way to save Hitsugi."
"I'll gladly kill Hitsugi to save you, Hitsugi."
"Gah!"
"Ah...! Ahhhhhhhh!"
"Gah... ahh... ah...! It hurts...! It hurts... it...!"
"A weapon crafted from lies is so frail. It broke so easily."
"Just you wait, Hitsugi. I'm going to kill that fake Hitsugi for you now."
"Don't be so scared, Hitsugi. It's okay, everything will be over soon. It will only hurt at first..."
"And then, you'll return to normal. Mother will return you back to normal."
"No... Please stop, Kohri... Stop... don't come any closer!"
"Hitsugi would never say such a thing."
"I did it, Hitsugi. I did it.... Now Hitsugi can return to normal. Just a little longer, Hitsugi."
"Fufu... Ahaha... Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha!"
